article: It was January 25th, 2008: Nisha and Akshaye's _ anniversary. But things had changed since their marriage. The couple _ about small things. Yet they still loved each other. Nisha thought her husband might have _ about their anniversary. When door bell rang, Nisha was _ happy that Akshaye had finally remembered. She ran to open the door. Indeed, Akshaye was standing outside and _ a bunch of flowers. They started to have a(n) _ night. But then the phone started ringing. Nisha went to _ it up. There was a man on the other _ of the phone. "Hello, madam. I am calling from the _ station. Is this Mr. Akshaye Malhotra's number?" "Yes, it is." "There was an _ , and a man died. We got your number from the man's wallet . We need you to come here and _ the body." Nisha's heart _ . "Whhhaat? B...but my husband is here with me." "Sorry, madam, the accident took place at 3:00 pm." She had heard that the soul of the dead person would come to meet you before it _ . She ran to the sitting room. Akshaye was not there. Had something bad really happened? If she had been given another chance, she would have mended all her _ . She was about to lose her senses. _ Akshaye came out of the bathroom, saying, "Dear, my wallet was _ while I was _ my way home this afternoon." Life might not give you a _ chance. So never waste a moment when you have the chance to make up for your deeds.
